activities.activity_description: Enjoy a romantic sunset cruise along the Bosphorus Strait, witnessing the city's iconic skyline as day turns to night. The tour includes light refreshments and live commentary.
Explore the opulent Topkapi Palace, home to Ottoman sultans for nearly 400 years. Discover its rich history, stunning architecture, and priceless artifacts with a knowledgeable guide.
Learn to cook authentic Turkish dishes in a hands-on cooking class. Visit a local market, prepare a 4-course meal, and enjoy your creations with fellow food enthusiasts.
Navigate the bustling Grand Bazaar with a local guide. Learn bargaining techniques, discover hidden gems, and shop for authentic Turkish souvenirs and handicrafts.
Witness the mesmerizing Sufi ritual of the Whirling Dervishes in a historic venue. Learn about the spiritual significance and enjoy traditional Turkish music.
Indulge in a traditional Turkish bath experience. Enjoy a steam room, exfoliating scrub, foam massage, and relaxation in a historic hammam setting.
Escape the city bustle with a day trip to the Princes' Islands. Enjoy a ferry ride, horse-drawn carriage tour, swimming, and a seafood lunch on Büyükada Island.

activities.activity_address: Sultan Ahmet, Ayasofya Meydanı No:1, 34122 Fatih/İstanbul
activities.activity_description: Discover the rich history and stunning architecture of Hagia Sophia with an expert guide. Learn about its transformation from a church to a mosque and now a museum.
Try your hand at fishing in the Bosphorus Strait. Learn local techniques, enjoy stunning views, and have the option to cook and eat your catch.
Experience the mystical tradition of Turkish coffee fortune telling. Enjoy a cup of authentic Turkish coffee and have your fortune read by a local seer.
Explore the colorful neighborhoods of Balat and Fener. Discover hidden churches, vibrant street art, and local cafes in these historic Jewish and Greek quarters.
Experience the Blue Mosque illuminated at night. Learn about Islamic architecture and enjoy the serene atmosphere with fewer crowds.
Take a scenic cable car ride to the summit of Mount Uludağ, offering panoramic views of Bursa and surrounding landscapes. Enjoy hiking or skiing depending on the season.
Explore the historic Grand Mosque of Bursa, known for its 20 domes and calligraphy-adorned walls. Learn about Ottoman architecture and Islamic traditions.
Visit the historic Silk Bazaar, once a major stop on the Silk Road. Shop for high-quality silk products, textiles, and local handicrafts with a knowledgeable guide.
Relax in a traditional Turkish bath, known for its healing thermal waters. Enjoy a steam room, massage, and scrub in a historic hammam setting.
Discover the highlights of Bursa, including the Green Mosque, Tomb of Osman Gazi, and Cumalıkızık Village. Learn about the city's rich Ottoman history.
Learn to prepare the famous Iskender kebab and other Bursa specialties in a hands-on cooking class. Enjoy your creations with fellow food enthusiasts.
Explore the scenic Uluabat Lake by boat. Observe diverse birdlife, visit the historic island village of Gölyazı, and enjoy a lakeside picnic lunch.
Discover artifacts from various civilizations that inhabited the region, including Roman, Byzantine, and Ottoman periods. Guided tour available.
Stroll through Bursa's beautiful botanical garden, home to diverse plant species, themed gardens, and peaceful walking trails. Perfect for nature lovers.
Visit the charming coastal town of Mudanya. Enjoy seafood restaurants, explore historic Ottoman houses, and relax on the beach.

activities.activity_title: Bursa Sword and Knife Making Workshop
activities.activity_description: Learn about traditional Turkish metalworking techniques. Create your own small knife or decorative sword under expert guidance.
Explore the well-preserved ruins of Ephesus, including the Library of Celsus, Temple of Artemis, and Great Theatre. Learn about ancient Roman life from an expert guide.
Discover Izmir's highlights, including Konak Square, Kemeralti Bazaar, and Kadifekale. Learn about the city's rich history and modern culture.
Visit the charming coastal towns of Cesme and Alacati. Enjoy beautiful beaches, picturesque streets, boutique shops, and excellent seafood restaurants.
Explore the vineyards of Urla and taste a variety of local wines. Learn about wine production techniques and enjoy a light lunch with vineyard views.
Observe various animal species in natural habitats at Izmir Wild Life Park. Enjoy interactive exhibits and educational presentations about wildlife conservation.
Explore the ancient Acropolis of Pergamon, including the impressive Theatre and Temple of Trajan. Learn about Hellenistic civilization and enjoy panoramic views.
Learn to prepare traditional Aegean dishes in a hands-on cooking class. Visit a local market, cook a 3-course meal, and enjoy your creations with Turkish wine.
Enjoy a scenic boat trip along the Karaburun Peninsula. Swim in secluded bays, snorkel in crystal-clear waters, and enjoy a freshly prepared lunch on board.
Explore the ancient ruins of Smyrna Agora, the old marketplace of Izmir. Learn about daily life in ancient times and see well-preserved Roman artifacts.
Visit Turkey's first 'Cittaslow' town. Enjoy organic local cuisine, explore traditional markets, and participate in sustainable living workshops.
Observe diverse bird species in their natural habitat at Izmir Bird Paradise. Guided tour includes bird watching equipment and expert commentary.
Taste your way through Izmir's historic bazaar. Sample local delicacies, Turkish coffee, and traditional sweets while exploring vibrant market stalls.
Experience a breathtaking sunrise hot air balloon flight over Cappadocia's unique landscape. Enjoy panoramic views of fairy chimneys and valleys.
Explore the ancient underground city of Derinkuyu. Discover multi-level tunnels, living quarters, and learn about the history of these subterranean settlements.
Discover rock-cut churches and monasteries with well-preserved Byzantine frescoes. Learn about early Christian history in Cappadocia.
Explore the beautiful Rose Valley on horseback. Ride through scenic paths, visit hidden cave churches, and enjoy stunning views of the landscape.
Experience traditional Turkish entertainment with folk dances, music, and a belly dancing show. Enjoy local cuisine and unlimited drinks.
Learn the art of pottery making in Avanos, famous for its red clay. Create your own ceramic piece under the guidance of skilled artisans.
Hike through the scenic Ihlara Valley, exploring rock-cut churches, ancient dwellings, and enjoying the natural beauty of the canyon.
Drive an ATV through Cappadocia's valleys and witness a stunning sunset over the unique landscape. Includes safety briefing and equipment.
Sample local Cappadocian wines in a cave winery. Learn about the region's viticulture and enjoy a selection of Turkish cheeses and appetizers.
Witness the spiritual Sema ceremony of the Whirling Dervishes in an authentic setting. Learn about Sufi traditions and mysticism.
Capture the beauty of Cappadocia with a professional photographer guide. Visit the best spots for landscape and cultural photography.
Learn to cook traditional Turkish dishes in a cave kitchen. Visit a local market, prepare a full meal, and enjoy your creations with Turkish wine.
Explore the charming streets of Antalya's Old Town. Visit historic sites, including Hadrian's Gate and the Clock Tower, and enjoy panoramic harbor views.
Witness the natural beauty of Upper and Lower Düden Waterfalls. Enjoy a picnic in the park and capture stunning photos of the falls.
Explore one of the world's largest tunnel aquariums. See diverse marine life, enjoy interactive exhibits, and visit the Snow World Ice Museum.
Discover the ruins of Perge, an ancient Anatolian city. Explore well-preserved Roman gates, baths, and the impressive stadium with an expert guide.

activities.activity_title: Boat Trip to Kekova Sunken City
activities.activity_description: Cruise to the sunken city of Kekova. Swim in turquoise waters, explore the ancient ruins, and visit the charming village of Simena.
Embark on an off-road adventure in the Taurus Mountains. Visit traditional villages, swim in mountain streams, and enjoy a barbecue lunch.
Explore one of Turkey's largest museums, housing artifacts from the Stone Age to Byzantine period. Highlights include the Hall of Gods and ancient sculptures.

activities.activity_title: Aspendos Theater and Side Day Trip
activities.activity_description: Visit the well-preserved Roman theater of Aspendos and explore the ancient city of Side. Includes visits to the Temple of Apollo and the Agora.
Experience the thrill of parasailing over the Mediterranean. Enjoy breathtaking views of Antalya's coastline from high above the sea.
Indulge in a traditional Turkish bath experience. Enjoy a steam room, body scrub, foam massage, and relaxation in a historic hammam.
Explore the ancient ruins of Olympos, relax on its beautiful beach, and witness the eternal flames of Chimera. Includes nature walks and swimming stops.
Experience white-water rafting in the scenic Köprülü Canyon. Includes safety briefing, equipment, and a riverside lunch after the adventure.
Explore the opulent Dolmabahçe Palace, home to the last Ottoman Sultans. Admire its blend of European and Ottoman styles and see the world's largest Bohemian crystal chandelier.
Enjoy a romantic dinner cruise along the Bosphorus. Savor Turkish cuisine while taking in views of illuminated palaces, mosques, and bridges.
Discover Istanbul's culinary delights in the vibrant Kadıköy district. Sample various street foods, visit local markets, and learn about Turkish cuisine.
Explore miniature versions of Turkey's most famous landmarks at Miniaturk, the world's largest miniature park. Perfect for families and photography enthusiasts.
Visit the elegant Beylerbeyi Palace, a former imperial Ottoman summer residence. Admire its ornate interiors and beautiful Bosphorus views.
Enjoy a guided trek through the beautiful landscapes of Uludağ National Park. Discover diverse flora and fauna, and enjoy panoramic views of Bursa.
Relax in the therapeutic waters of Oylat Hot Springs. Enjoy spa treatments and the natural beauty of the surrounding forest.
Experience the thrill of paragliding from Uludağ mountain. Enjoy breathtaking views of Bursa and the surrounding landscape from the air.
Capture the beauty of Bursa's historic sites and natural landscapes with a professional photographer guide. Perfect for all skill levels.
Learn the art of traditional Iznik tile making. Create your own tile under expert guidance and take home a unique souvenir.
Explore the charming hillside village of Sirince. Taste local wines, shop for handmade crafts, and enjoy panoramic views of olive groves.
Visit the stunning white travertine terraces of Pamukkale and explore the ancient city of Hierapolis. Includes round-trip transportation from Izmir.
Learn to windsurf or kitesurf in the windy bay of Alaçatı. Suitable for beginners and intermediate levels. Equipment and instruction included.
Experience Izmir's vibrant nightlife in the Alsancak district. Visit popular bars, enjoy live music, and mingle with locals.

activities.activity_address: Agora Open Air Museum, Konak, İzmir
activities.activity_description: Relax in the restored Roman baths at the Agora. Enjoy traditional spa treatments and learn about ancient bathing rituals.
Experience a luxurious hot air balloon ride at sunrise, followed by a champagne breakfast with panoramic views of Cappadocia's landscape.
Explore Cappadocia's valleys and off-road trails on a quad bike. Enjoy the thrill of riding through unique landscapes and hidden caves.
Discover the unique fairy chimney rock formations in Paşabağı. Learn about their geological formation and cultural significance.
Experience a night of traditional Turkish entertainment in a cave restaurant. Enjoy folk dances, live music, and a mesmerizing belly dance show.

activities.activity_title: Cappadocia Cooking Class in a Cave
activities.activity_description: Learn to cook traditional Cappadocian dishes in a unique cave kitchen. Visit a local market, prepare a full meal, and enjoy your creations.

activities.activity_title: Antalya City Tour with Duden Waterfall
activities.activity_description: Explore Antalya's old town, visit the iconic Duden Waterfall, and enjoy a panoramic tour of the city's modern areas.

activities.activity_title: Phaselis Ancient City and Beach Day
activities.activity_description: Visit the ancient ruins of Phaselis, surrounded by pine forests. Enjoy swimming and relaxing on its beautiful beaches.
Hike to the ancient city of Termessos, hidden high in the Taurus Mountains. Explore well-preserved ruins and enjoy stunning mountain views.
Experience the underwater world of the Mediterranean. Suitable for beginners and certified divers. Includes two dives and equipment.
Enjoy a day of water slides, pools, and family fun at one of Antalya's top water parks. Suitable for all ages.
Explore the aromatic Spice Bazaar, taste traditional Turkish delights, and learn about the history of spices in Ottoman cuisine.
Escape the city bustle with a bicycle tour of Büyükada, the largest of the Princes' Islands. Enjoy car-free roads and beautiful Victorian-era mansions.
Learn the art of Turkish calligraphy from a master calligrapher. Create your own piece of art to take home as a unique souvenir.
Capture the beauty of Istanbul's shoreline on a photography-focused Bosphorus cruise. Receive tips from a professional photographer guide.
Learn to make traditional Turkish ice cream (dondurma) known for its unique texture. Discover the secrets of its elasticity and resistance to melting.
Experience adrenaline-pumping activities like zip-lining, rock climbing, and high ropes courses in a safe, supervised environment.
Visit the 600-year-old Inkaya Plane Tree, enjoy traditional Turkish tea under its massive canopy, and take in panoramic views of Bursa.
Explore Bursa's rich textile history at this interactive museum. Learn about silk production and traditional weaving techniques.
Enjoy a scenic hike to Saitabat Waterfall. Admire the natural beauty, have a picnic by the falls, and cool off in the pristine waters.
Explore Bursa's beautiful Botanical Park, home to thousands of plant species. Enjoy themed gardens, walking trails, and a peaceful lake.
Visit Izmir Birds Paradise, a wetland sanctuary home to numerous bird species. Enjoy birdwatching and learn about local ecosystems.
Discover the ancient Agora of Smyrna, exploring well-preserved Roman and Hellenistic ruins in the heart of Izmir.
Visit the charming coastal town of Foça. Explore its historic streets, enjoy fresh seafood, and relax on beautiful beaches.
Learn about olive oil production, participate in olive picking (seasonal), and enjoy an olive oil tasting session.
Discover Izmir's vibrant street art scene. Explore colorful murals and learn about local artists and their inspirations.
Capture Cappadocia's unique landscapes on a guided photography tour. Visit the best spots for sunrise, sunset, and panoramic shots.
Enjoy a scenic hike through the Red Valley, culminating in a breathtaking sunset view over Cappadocia's unique rock formations.
Learn the traditional Turkish art of marbling (Ebru). Create your own unique artwork to take home as a souvenir.
Visit a local organic farm, learn about sustainable agriculture, and enjoy a farm-to-table lunch with fresh, seasonal produce.
Capture the stunning night sky over Cappadocia's unique landscape. Learn astrophotography techniques from an expert guide.
Enjoy a day at the famous Lara Beach. Relax on golden sands, swim in crystal-clear waters, and try various water sports activities.
Learn to cook traditional Antalya dishes in a hands-on cooking class. Visit a local market and enjoy the meal you prepare.
Experience the thrill of ziplining across the stunning Köprülü Canyon. Enjoy panoramic views of the canyon and river below.
Explore Sandland, an open-air museum featuring impressive sand sculptures. Enjoy both day and night visits with special lighting effects.
Explore Antalya's beautiful coastline and historic sites on a guided bicycle tour. Suitable for all fitness levels.
Taste your way through Istanbul's vibrant street food scene. Sample local delicacies and learn about Turkish culinary traditions.
Join local fishermen for a fishing trip on the Bosphorus. Learn traditional techniques and enjoy the catch of the day for lunch.
Experience the traditional art of Turkish coffee fortune telling. Enjoy a cup of Turkish coffee and have your fortune read from the grounds.
Experience Istanbul's vibrant nightlife. Visit trendy bars, enjoy live music venues, and dance at popular nightclubs.
Take a nostalgic ride on Istanbul's historic tram line. Travel from Taksim to Tünel, enjoying views of Istiklal Street.
Explore the historic Silk Bazaar (Koza Han). Shop for high-quality silk products and learn about Bursa's silk-making heritage.
Watch a traditional Karagöz and Hacivat shadow puppet show, a UNESCO-recognized cultural heritage of Turkey.
Experience Bursa's history through a 360-degree panoramic painting depicting the conquest of Bursa by the Ottomans.
Taste Bursa's famous dishes on a guided food tour. Try İskender kebab, candied chestnuts, and other local specialties.

activities.activity_title: Bursa Uludag Ski Resort Day Trip
activities.activity_description: Enjoy a day of skiing or snowboarding at Uludağ, Turkey's premier winter sports resort. Suitable for all skill levels.
Capture stunning photos of Izmir's iconic Clock Tower. Learn about its history and significance to the city.
Explore the bustling Kemeralti Market. Shop for local goods, taste traditional snacks, and experience the vibrant atmosphere.
Enjoy a relaxing sunset cruise in Izmir Bay. Take in panoramic views of the city skyline and coastline.
Take a ride in the historic Asansor elevator for panoramic views of Izmir. Learn about its unique history and architecture.
Experience Izmir's vibrant street music scene. Walk through popular areas and enjoy performances by local musicians.
Start your day with a rejuvenating yoga session as the sun rises over Cappadocia's unique landscape.
Visit local wineries and taste a variety of Cappadocian wines. Learn about the region's unique viticulture.
Learn the traditional art of Turkish carpet weaving. Create your own small carpet to take home as a souvenir.
Explore Cappadocia's valleys on horseback. Suitable for beginners and experienced riders.
Witness the mesmerizing Sema ceremony of the Whirling Dervishes in an authentic setting.
Spend a day at Antalya's popular Konyaalti Beach. Swim, sunbathe, and enjoy beachside cafes and activities.
Explore Antalya's historic old town on a fun Segway tour. Visit key landmarks and enjoy panoramic views.
Hike to several stunning waterfalls near Antalya, including the Upper and Lower Düden Waterfalls.
Enjoy a luxurious sunset cruise along Antalya's coastline. Includes dinner and drinks on board.
Explore one of the world's largest tunnel aquariums. See diverse marine life and visit the Snow World Ice Museum.
Watch the mesmerizing Sema ceremony of the Whirling Dervishes in a historic venue.
Enjoy a romantic dinner cruise along the Bosphorus. Includes Turkish cuisine, live entertainment, and stunning night views.
Explore Turkey's first modern art museum, featuring contemporary works by Turkish and international artists.
Explore the car-free Princes' Islands by bicycle. Visit historic mansions, enjoy beach stops, and have a seafood lunch.
Relax in a traditional Turkish bath. Includes steam room, body scrub, and massage in a historic hammam.
Explore the stunning Green Mosque, known for its intricate tile work and unique architecture.
Take a scenic cable car ride to the top of Uludağ Mountain for panoramic views of Bursa.
Sample various flavors of Turkish Delight at a traditional confectionery. Learn about its history and production.
Shop for local goods and souvenirs in Bursa's historic covered bazaar. Practice your bargaining skills.
Relax in Bursa's famous thermal springs. Enjoy various pools and spa treatments for ultimate rejuvenation.
Explore Izmir's culinary scene by bicycle. Stop at local eateries to taste regional specialties.
Explore the ancient Kadifekale Castle. Enjoy panoramic views of Izmir and learn about the city's history.
Enjoy a relaxing picnic in one of Izmir's most beautiful parks. Includes a prepared picnic basket with local treats.
Learn street art techniques from local artists. Create your own piece on a designated wall in the city.
Learn to play traditional Turkish instruments like the saz or darbuka in a hands-on workshop.
